channel.title: Onboarding on Sohan's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Onboarding on Sohan's Blog

item.title: Onboarding as a New Engineering Manager
item.description: “I promise to take care of you” - believe it or not, I spent hours to come up with this message to make a first impression as a newly hired manager at Microsoft. Everyone in my team had more context than me. I was a complete newbie, yet their manager. While I had been a manager for several years, I had never started a new job as a manager. I felt super vulnerable.
